Class SimpleChainCrfFeatureExtractor

java.lang.Object
  SimpleChainCrfFeatureExtractor
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.aliasi.crf.ChainCrfFeatureExtractor<java.lang.String>, java.io.Serializable
public class SimpleChainCrfFeatureExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.aliasi.crf.ChainCrfFeatureExtractor<java.lang.String>, java.io.Serializable

Feature extractor for pre-trained LingPipe CRF tagger The purpose of this class is similar to the "template configuration" in other CRF libs, e.g., CRF++. The topology of the probability dependency network, i.e., Bigram, Trigram, combining feature types, edge features, is defined by this file. This is deliverately placed under the default package to work with the LingPipe sample codes.

Author:
josephcc
